scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.watch-cluster: npm run server-cluster & npm run client
scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server && npm install
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm start --prefix server
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run build --prefix client && npm run cluster --prefix server
scripts.test: npm test --prefix client && npm test --prefix server
